Articles.Content:
I'm not sure where to put this, so I put it here as it is kind of a Fan Work. Also set the prefix to Special as other things didn't match at all.

Does anyone know if there is a place to send real-life fan mail to Squad? Like a PO Box for example. I can't find it myself because I suck at finding stuff .

Contact page of the website, you have the address of Squad.

I would may be probably contact them through the form first to make sure the adress is ok. You would probably have to tell them what you want to send and loose the surprise.

Thanks! So I guess that

This is something else:

Electro Chango S.A. de C.V.

This is the RFC thingy:

RFC: ECA0907317WA

and this is the actual address:

Zamora 196, Condesa, 06140

Mexico City, Mexico

and thats the phone number:

+52 55 52 12 17 20

So It would be:

Squad, Zamora 196, Condesa, 06140

Mexico City, Mexico
